title.rendered: Video: JavaScript, reduceRight() and function/operator symmetry

content.rendered:
A friend of mine asked for use cases for the reduceRight JavaScript Array method the other week. I made a little video explaining:

  • What reduce does
  • What function/operator symmetry is
  • How this affects reduce and reduceRight’s behaviour

(Also on YouTube)

excerpt.rendered: A friend of mine asked for use cases for the reduceRight JavaScript Array method the other week. I made a little video explaining it.
